summary.para: The module contained in the DevExpress.ExpressApp.Workflow.v12.1.dll assembly.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Workflow.WorkflowModule.ActivateStartWorkflowController

summary.para: Specifies whether or not the StartWorkflowController is active.

member.value: true, if the StartWorkflowController is active; otherwise - false.
